main event: Multiple sightings of an unidentified flying object reported over Cleveland, Ohio on June 10 and June 13, 1954.
interesting points: One witness observed an object circulating at high speeds, which blacked out under a cloud layer., During a separate sighting, an object was described as pulsating and changing colors from orange to red to blue every 30-35 seconds., The object was observed moving in a southerly direction at approximately 30-35 miles per hour., Several witnesses including a wife and a neighbor corroborated the sighting and provided similar descriptions., One report indicated a cigar-shaped object moving with the speed of a T-33 jet.
witness description: various residents including a husband, wife, neighbor, and two others
